verses.verse: The <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> all the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> shall have no <S%H2506>portion<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> and his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
They shall have no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as he has spoken to <S%H1696>them.<s%>

This shall be the <S%H3548>priests<s%>' <S%H4941>due<s%> from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> from those who <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> whether it be <S%H7794>ox<s%> or <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> that they shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H2220>shoulder,<s%> and the two <S%H3895>cheeks,<s%> and the <S%H6896>maw.<s%>

The first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of your <S%H1715>grain,<s%> of your new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and of your <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1488>fleece<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> you shall give <S%H5414>him.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> him out of all your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> him and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H3117>ever.<s%>

If a <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> from <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates<s%> out of all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> where he <S%H1481>lives<s%> as a <S%H935>foreigner,<s%> and comes with all the <S%H185>desire<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H977>choose;<s%>

then he shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> as all his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5975>do,<s%> who stand there <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
They shall have like <S%H2506>portions<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> besides that which comes of the <S%H4465>sale<s%> of his <S%H1>patrimony.<s%>

When you have <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3925>you,<s%> you shall not learn to <S%H6213>do<s%> after the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of those <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

There shall not be <S%H4672>found<s%> with you anyone who makes his <S%H1121>son<s%> or his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> one who <S%H7080>uses<s%> <S%H7081>divination,<s%> one who practices <S%H6049>sorcery,<s%> or an <S%H5172>enchanter,<s%> or a <S%H3784>sorcerer,<s%>
or a <S%H2266>charmer,<s%> or a <S%H7592>consulter<s%> with a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> or a <S%H3049>wizard,<s%> or a <S%H1875>necromancer.<s%>

For whoever <S%H6213>does<s%> these things is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and <S%H1558>because<s%> of these <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> does drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> from before <S%H6440>you.<s%>
You shall be <S%H8549>perfect<s%> with <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

For these <S%H1471>nations,<s%> that you shall <S%H3423>dispossess,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to those who practice <S%H6049>sorcery,<s%> and to <S%H7080>diviners;<s%> but as for <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> has not allowed you so to <S%H5414>do.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> to you a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H251>you,<s%> of your brothers, like <S%H8085>me.<s%> You shall listen to him.

This is according to all that you <S%H7592>desired<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let me not <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> neither let me <S%H7200>see<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> any <S%H4191>more,<s%> that I not die."
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3190>me,<s%> "They have well said that which they have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

I will raise them <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> like <S%H5414>you;<s%> and I will put my <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them all that I shall command <S%H6680>him.<s%>
It shall <S%H376>happen,<s%> that whoever will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to my <S%H1697>words<s%> which he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> I will require it of <S%H1875>him.<s%>

But the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> who shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> which I have not <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to <S%H1696>speak,<s%> or who shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> that same <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>"
If you <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> "How shall we <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>"

when a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> if the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H935>doesn't<s%> follow, nor happen, that is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken:<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it <S%H2087>presumptuously,<s%> you shall not be afraid of <S%H1481>him.<s%>
